name: zombie apocalypse but with one zombie
name_original: zombie apocalypse but with one zombie
description:
the reason it's a scratch file is that posting one converted to html didnt work so you need to download scratch 2 to play it i think (unles scratch 3 online ediitor also works but im not sure)

sadly no time and too busy to finish :(

the game might have bugs or not be fun to play so watch out for that!

the last weapon i still managed to implement is a sniper (5000 score) so just to let you know you dont need to waste any more time lol

fun fact: pistol and knife was made by me without any refference, submachine gun and the rifle were based on my gun toys and the sniper rifle was based on a gun i have in a game (roblox > phantom forces > intervention with custom skin)

idrk what to say besides that, you can ask me in the comments what you think, would like to see etc.

also the theme part is that the less health you have the more damage your weapons do

thanks for all feedback and everything!
